title: Deposit Made
description: Fired when a deposit is made into an account.

amount.description: The monetary amount of the deposit.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account receiving the deposit.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

depositMethod.description: The method used for the deposit.

transactionId.description: Unique identifier for the deposit transaction.
